title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Advanced Problem-Based Learning for STEM Real-World Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Major-specific foundational mathematics knowledge (calculus, linear algebra, statistics), scientific problem-solving experience, and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Define real-world STEM problems from industrial settings through mathematical modeling and propose solutions
Systematically design and implement team-based problem-solving strategies via the PBL process
Derive realistic solutions applying mathematical approaches under constrained conditions

Through STEM expert-student mentoring systems, learners: 1) conduct regular monthly mentoring sessions (≥2 times/month) with one expert, 2) draft career roadmaps linked to their research fields based on mentoring content, and 3) submit final reports reflecting ≥3 feedback points received from experts at course completion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
